  • java.lang.Object
    • ARELInterpreterAndroid
      • com.metaio.sdk.ARELInterpreterAndroidJava
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MediaPlayer.OnCompletionListener, MediaPlayer.OnErrorListener, MediaPlayer.OnInfoListener, MediaPlayer.OnPreparedListener

    public class ARELInterpreterAndroidJava
extends ARELInterpreterAndroid
implements MediaPlayer.OnCompletionListener, MediaPlayer.OnPreparedListener, MediaPlayer.OnErrorListener, MediaPlayer.OnInfoListener
